acknowledgement.p: I compiled this document in the scope of my responsibilities as a graduate teaching assistant. There may be typos, unexpected copyright violations, or failures of understanding. Kindly email any questions, comments, complaints, or corrections to colton.grainger@colorado.edu. Thank you.

This document is (presently 2019-08-22) adapted from the following:
MAT 102 Functions by Robin Cruz, Lynda Danielson, and Katherine Yoshiwara; and
Calculus Lab Manual by Alex Jordan (and others at PCC).
